name: 5.5" or 6.5" Vintage Brass Snare Limited Time Only
description:
CT Drums Exclusive!!!

A true one-of-a-kind drum,
made to our exact specs.

Derived from some of the best qualities
of vintage early American brass snare
drums that are so highly sought after.


** LIMITED AVAILABILITY **
THESE DRUMS WILL SELL OUT!


* Pictured w/ die cast hoops as an upgrade. Standard 2.3mm Triple flanged hoops included at this price. *


Size:
5.5x14" or 6.5x14"

Series:
Vintage Brass

Finish:
Polished Brass

Hardware:
Chrome Parts
Full Length Tube Lugs (x8 or x10)
2.3mm Triple Flanged Hoops
Trick Multi-Step Throwoff
Remo Drumheads
Bronze 20 Strand Snare Wires

Description:
Crafted from thin solid brass for its full bodied resonance and versatility. We have researched and mimicd the best qualities of early American brass shells, like the thin 1.2mm shell thickness, installed center bead, vintage style rolled edges and smooth gradual snare beds for great articulation and tuning range. They have that classic crisp brass sound with tons of depth and tone along with killer sensitivity that is highly sought after in any snare. These drums can be tuned way up for a quick high pitched crack to very low for a fatter back beat, while the medium tuning creates a versatile smooth playability with great mid focus tone. Perfect for any style of player, great for any snare drum collection.

The included 2.3mm triple flanged provide an open sound with a wide tuning range and versatility. Solid made vintage style chrome plated brass tube lugs are minimally attached with a small footprint and add to that classic style. Trick multi step throwoff offers 3 locking positions and smooth operation. Remo Ambassador drum heads and 20 strand bronze wires also included. A classic, top of the line drum straight out of the box.

Upgrade Options
Die Cast Hoops (+70)
Single Flange Hoops & Clips (+$100)
Chrome Over Brass Hoops (+$85)
Black Nickel or Brass Hardware (+$30)
Various Lugs, Throwoffs, & More....

Add any upgrades to your comments area in your shopping cart after purchase and we will send an invoice for your upgrades. Or contact us for more info or a quote.


Video Sample:
Coming Soon!


** Please Note **
1-2 week assembly time. Shipping and taxes may apply. Some restrictions may apply. Local delivery is free, shipping costs will be refunded. Items may sell out and maybe refunded.


** LIMITED AVAILABILITY **
THESE DRUMS WILL SELL OUT!


CONTACT US for further details.

name: 6.5x14" Burnt Sienna Maple 7ply w/ Steel Rolled Hoops
description:
Size: 6.5x14" Series: Maple 7ply w/ re-rings Finish: Burnt Sienna Satin Stain Hardware: Chrome Parts Full Length Tube Lugs x10 4.5mm Steel Rolled Hoops Mini Hoop Claws Trick Throwoff German Snare Wires Remo Drumheads Description: A great mix of old school with modern tech. The shell is a thin 7ply all maple construction with added 7ply reinforcement rings. This shell creates a very fat, open body with a touch of focus and cut from the re-rings. The 4.5mm cold rolled steel hoops are similar to vintage single flange hoops that give the drum a more boxy, older tone but since the hoops are much thicker and are heavy steel, they produce more cut and heavy rimshots. These hoops can be considered a cross of die cast and single flanged hoops. A very deep sounding drum with good crack and plenty of punch. Fitted with the best hardware available, including a new all chrome Trick multi step throwoff, chrome over solid brass tube lugs, Remo drumheads and German snare wires.
*Note*: These first quality drums maybe demos, one-offs, and are promo priced. If sold out, contact us to build something similar. Shipping and taxes may apply. Local delivery is free, and shipping costs will be refunded. International order shipping quotes based upon final destination, quoted after purchase. CONTACT US for further details.

name: 5x14" Solid Single Ply Birdseye Maple w/ Matching Hoops
description:
Size: 5x14" Series: Solid Single Ply Steambent Finish: Natural High Gloss Hardware: Chrome Parts Full Length Tube Lugs 32ply "Yamaha" Style Wood Hoops Trick Throwoff German Snare Wires Remo Drumheads Description: This snare is quite the head turner. We have kept it nice and safe in our personal collection, yet rarely we let it see light for a shocking presentation. This thing has barely ever been played and looks like it's been dipped in wet glass... (due to the nature of our photo booth, we block all reflections, but trust us when we say it looks "wet".) The solid steambent single ply shell in rare birdseye maple has exquisite figuring and plenty of heavy birdseye knots. The matching wood hoops are veneered inside and out over our 32ply "Yamaha" style maple hoops. This drum has incredible body and tons of fat tone. It can be tuned high or be tuned way low and always sounds phenomenal. Fitted with the best hardware available, including a (not pictured) brand new chrome plated Trick multi step throwoff, chrome over solid brass tube lugs, Remo drumheads and German snare wires. Compare this to other more expensive solid shell snare drums, add the high gloss, a rare wood, matching hoops, and quality parts to realize this screaming deal. Get it before we change our minds and put it back in the case!
*Note*: These first quality drums maybe demos, one-offs, and are promo priced. If sold out, contact us to build something similar. Shipping and taxes may apply. Local delivery is free, and shipping costs will be refunded. International order shipping quotes based upon final destination, quoted after purchase. CONTACT US for further details.

description:
Size: 5.5x14" Series: Standard 8ply Maple Finish: Natural Satin Oil Hardware: Chrome Parts Full Length Tube Lugs x10 2.3mm Triple Flanged Hoops RCK Throwoff German Snare Wires Remo Drumheads Description: A perfect snare drum fitted for any style of drummer. name: 5.5x13" Solid Single Ply Steambent Maple in Dark Walnut High Gloss
description:
Size: 5.5x13" Series: Solid Single Ply Steambent Finish: Dark Walnut Stained High Gloss Hardware: Chrome Parts Full Length Tube Lugs x8 2.3mm Triple Flanged Hoops Trick Throwoff German Snare Wires Remo Drumheads Description: A nice little snare that has a great tone without sounding too deep or too shallow. The 13" diameter adds a bit more focus and "pop" compared to a standard 14" shell. The solid steambent single ply shell adds a very warm sound with more tone than standard ply shells. A cool snare and great addition to any collection. Fitted with the best hardware available, including a Trick multi step throwoff, chrome over solid brass tube lugs, Remo drumheads and German snare wires. Compare this to other company's more expensive solid shell snare drums, and get a crazy deal on this before it gets away!
*Note*: These first quality drums maybe demos, one-offs, and are promo priced. If sold out, contact us to build something similar. Shipping and taxes may apply. Local delivery is free, and shipping costs will be refunded. International order shipping quotes based upon final destination, quoted after purchase. CONTACT US for further details.

name: 5.5x14" Maple 8ply Solid White w/ White Hardware
description:
Size: 5.5x14" Series: Standard 8ply Maple Finish: Solid White High Gloss Hardware: All White Gloss Tail Light Lugs 7/8 Offset 2.3mm Triple Flanged Hoops EGO Throwoff Standard Steel Wires Remo Drumheads Description: A classic drum sound with a new sleek all-white gloss look. A smooth finish with matching hardware gives this drum a super clean look. The drum sound is very versatile with a medium sound of tone, cut, projection and added sensitivity. A great drum for any style of music or player. All white gloss parts, with tail light lugs with a split 7/8" offset spacing, matching 2.3mm triple flanged hoops for maximum resonance and open bodied tone, and an EGO throwoff that is made of solid aluminum and has a great industrial look and fluid movement. Note: A small scratch by the badge appeared after a trade show. Very minor cosmetic scratch that will not develop further or effect the sound, it is strictly in the clear coat not the color or wood. Video Sample: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rXAnVpfr1jI
*Note*: These first quality drums maybe demos, one-offs, or back stock items and are all promo priced. If sold out, contact us to build something similar. Shipping and taxes may apply. Local delivery is free, and shipping costs will be refunded. International orders please contact us prior to purchase. CONTACT US for further details.
